sharp/favorable/advantage/benefit/profit/interest/to do good to/to benefit

pinyin: tu3 di4 li4 yong4 gui1 hua4

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳和肯得及就是利用这种国际化策略来盈利的。

sentences.english: Further eytogenetic analysis and breeding utilization of this intergeneric hybrid are still being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前正进一步开展细胞遗传和育种利用研究。

sentences.english: So it's a kind of machine which take advantage of fatigue-fracture.
sentences.chinese: 因而，它是一种化害为利，利用疲劳断裂下料的机械。

sentences.english: Mr Wei rushed to Taipei during his rest day on a Sunday to see Mr Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 魏姓同学便利用星期日赶到台北和张先生见面。

sentences.english: At the same time, the use of coal exhaustive method to optimize selection.
sentences.chinese: 同时利用穷举法对配煤进行优化选取。

sentences.english: The team failed to capitalize on their early lead.
sentences.chinese: 这个队未能充分利用开场时领前的优势。

sentences.english: One relatively harmless alternative to sun tanning is to use self-tanning lotions.
sentences.chinese: 相对无害的替代办法之一是利用太阳鞣自我鞣洗剂。

sentences.english: By linking Micro-computer and the 721-Spectrophotometre together, the automatic operation of the 721-Spectrophotometre is realized.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了利用微型计算机与721型订光光度汁相联帆。

sentences.english: This NNC is utilized by way of associative memory.
sentences.chinese: 网络的使用利用联想记忆法则。

sentences.english: Women do phonological processing with both their right and left inferior frontal gyri .
sentences.chinese: 女人是利用她们左右眉骨后的侧脑回发音的。

sentences.english: Under the condition of artificial feeding, effect of using cement quadrel to collect eggs was good.
sentences.chinese: 在人工饲养条件下，利用水泥方砖采卵效果良好。

sentences.english: The sophisticated system destroys enemy warheads through direct "hit-to-kill" technology. "It's like hitting a bullet with a bullet," Watkins says.
sentences.chinese: 系统利用命中即摧毁技术，摧毁敌方的弹头。

sentences.english: The vacuolar amino acid pool is utilized during initiation of budding .
sentences.chinese: 当出芽开始时，液泡的氨基酸库被利用。

sentences.english: Using this function, we can get more representational eigenvector from email.
sentences.chinese: 利用此函数可提取到更具有代表性的邮件特征向量。

sentences.english: One possibility: tapping state disability funds.
sentences.chinese: 一种可能就是利用州伤病基金。

sentences.english: Building offside tactics is one kind when use regulation and design defends tactics.
sentences.chinese: 造越位战术是利用规则而设计的一种防守战术。
